short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays a banner on an Okta login page to help the user determine if it's a valid login page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension displays a banner on an Okta login page to help the user determine if it's a valid login page. This could help against attacks that proxy traffic to the legitimate Okta login page.
